Text:
I don't get it. I install Office and install toolkit - no problem, it works and if I press "check" in toolkit it says it is active. The next day Office will not open. If I run toolkit and press "check" it says:



If I run toolkit for win7 it says:
Name: Windows(R) 7, Ultimate edition
Description: Windows Operating System - Windows(R) 7, OEM_SLP channel
Family: Ultimate

Apparently, something happens at midnight, and I am sure it has to do with won7, not Office. The readme says KMSnano (and toolkit???) will not work with Win 7 Ultimate, it this true?
Toolkit (and KMSnano) only seem to work with VL editions like Win 7 pro or enterprise. Problem is, there is no good copy of Win 7 Pro on Piratebay...
* The next day Office will not open. If I run toolkit and press "check" it says:

win7 banned the kms key almost instantly. It's likely that you installed kb971033. I think that is the one that sends info back and forth to microsoft. *I could be wrong.

You can try figuring out a way to uninstall kb971033. I'm not entirely sure how to do it, but I know of at least two ways. One would be to boot into dart8 and remove offline kb files. Another would be to re-install windows.

I'm sure there are much better solutions out there. I'm just offering advice.

@murphy78: tnx for you advice! So basically I am screwed and need to reinstall win7? But how do I control that my new installation of win7 ultimate doesn't automatically install the kb971033?
Then again, I read this:
http://forums.mydigitallife.info/threads/19404-Not-genuine-after-KB971033-update-Read-this!

And when I checked, I DON'T have the partial product Key' as "PMJBM". So maybe I don't have that installed. The problem started allready with Office2010 that suddenly didn't want to start, so I am sure some win7 update screwed it up for me. Now Office 2013 doesn't work either. I guess a fresh win7 install and never download any updates is the only solution??
